title: Deconstructing Naïve Faith of the Enlightenment
description:
Tom Holland, Jordan Peterson and Douglas Murray are signs of a sea change in the Estuary. When Tom Holland tells Glen Scrivener he's lost his faith it doesn't mean he's deconstructed away from Christianity but is sort of inching towards it. 

Jordan Peterson and Susan Blackmore on Unbelievable with Justin Brierley https://youtu.be/syP-OtdCIho
Tom Holland with Glen Scrivener on Speak Life https://youtu.be/favILmUsVdg
Douglas Murray moving from one belief system to another https://youtu.be/B810MLbgj4E
Jordan Peterson Bret Weinstein Sam Harris Vancouver 1 https://youtu.be/d-Z9EZE8kpo
Bruce Almighty https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bruce_Almighty
Brett Salkeld https://youtu.be/SloRs2yzmvo
Nathan Jacobs Reaching Nones and Dones https://youtu.be/ME54BibXfYs
Steven Smith Pagans and Christians in the Secular City https://youtu.be/W9I9sVUta5s
Tom Holland Did Religion Exist in the Ancient World https://youtu.be/ZeCTC_r4vMI
Will Durant Story of Civilization Volume 10 https://amzn.to/3jZQmv9
The Idea of Progress https://amzn.to/2SSdVKm

Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/jdVk8XU 

Vanderklips channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX0jIcadtoxELSwehCh5QTg

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/

To support this channel/podcast with Ethereum (ETH): 0xd3F649C3403a4789466c246F32430036DADf6c62

https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay

Also on Lbry: https://lbry.tv/@paulvanderklay

Paul's Church Content at Living Stones Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh7bdktIALZ9Nq41oVCvW-A

To support Paul's work by supporting his church give here. https://tithe.ly/give?c=2160640
